instructions: Open the Twitter app on your Android or iOS device and tap your profile picture in the top-left corner. From the menu, tap Settings and privacy > Display and sound . Tap the Dark mode toggle to activate dark mode on your Twitter app. Two new options will appear: Dim and Lights out . Tap Dim for a dark blue theme or Lights out for a purely black dark mode look. To disable Twitter dark mode at any time, tap the Dark mode toggle again. Likewise, you can also switch between the Dim and Lights out options whenever you like. Tap the Home icon on the bottom menu to exit the settings and return to your Twitter timeline .
